description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in voidCoders Void Contact Form 7 Widget For Elementor Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Void Contact Form 7 Widget For Elementor Page Builder: from n/a through 2.4.1.

product.name: Void Contact Form 7 Widget For Elementor Page Builder
